SuccessInterval.name: Delay next run by X minutes after success

FailureInterval.name: Delay next run by X minutes after failure

Serial.name: Emulator Serial
Serial.help:
Common emulator serials are listed below. Set to "auto" to auto-detect. If multiple emulators are running or an emulator doesn't support auto-detection, you must set it manually.
Default emulator serials:
- MuMu5.0/MuMu12 127.0.0.1:16384
- LDPlayer emulator-5554 or 127.0.0.1:5555
- BlueStacks 127.0.0.1:5555

PackageName.name: Game Client
PackageName.help: If multiple game clients are installed on the emulator, select the correct one manually

AdbRestart.name: Attempt to restart adb when no device is detected

_info.name: Emulator Settings
_info.help: Values below are auto-filled based on Serial. Do not modify unless you know what you're doing.

Screens.name: Multi-Screen Mode
Screens.help: When enabled, supports running the game window on secondary or virtual displays. You will also need to manually select the target screen for the game window.

ScreenNumber.name: Game Window Target Screen
ScreenNumber.help: Select the screen that meets the resolution requirements. The default is 0 (main screen). You must enable Multi-Screen Mode first. After selection, the game window will move to the corresponding screen. The screen order may differ from the system display settings.

GameResolutionCompat.name: Game Resolution Compatibility Mode
GameResolutionCompat.help: Enable if script reports incorrect game resolution or logs show window resolution not equal to 720x1280

CloseAutoHdr.name: Disable Auto HDR
CloseAutoHdr.help: NKAS may not work properly on systems with HDR enabled. If system HDR is on, enable this option to disable the game's auto-HDR (system-wide HDR remains unaffected)

ScreenRotate.name: Rotate Screen
ScreenRotate.help: Recommended for 1080p users only. When enabled, the screen will switch to portrait on start to meet vertical resolution requirements; it will revert to landscape after tasks finish or by pressing Ctrl+F12

GameWindowPosition.name: Game Window Position
GameWindowPosition.help: Set the game window position to prevent it from being obscured or off-screen

Account.name: Account
Account.help: Paste your email here. It will be auto-filled if login expires. This feature has security risks; use with caution.

Password.name: Password
Password.help: Paste your password here. It will be auto-filled if login expires. This feature has security risks; use with caution.

Client.name: Game Client
Client.help: Launcher and game title/process will be auto-filled based on selected client. Clear related launcher/game title/process settings before switching.

AutoFillName.name: Auto Fill Fields
AutoFillName.help: Automatically fills in the launcher and game title and process information

LauncherPath.name: Launcher Path
LauncherPath.help: Game launcher path. Required. Example: E:\NIKKE\Launcher\nikke_launcher.exe

LauncherTitleName.name: Launcher Title
LauncherTitleName.help: Launcher window title; usually no manual input required

LauncherProcessName.name: Launcher Process
LauncherProcessName.help: Launcher process name; usually no manual input required

GamePath.name: Game Path
GamePath.help: Game path; usually auto-filled based on launcher path. Manually change if auto-filled path is incorrect

GameTitleName.name: Game Title
GameTitleName.help: Game window title; usually no manual input required

GameProcessName.name: Game Process
GameProcessName.help: Game process name; usually no manual input required

AutoRedCircle.name: Auto-click red circles during battle
AutoRedCircle.help: Requires enabling sync-click position and crosshair. Currently supports Interception, Tower, Simulation Room, Solo Raid, Union Raid, Coop, etc. Accuracy is low; circles outside the screen cannot be handled

OcrModelType.name: OCR Model Selection
OcrModelType.help: Mobile model (default): fast, slightly lower accuracy; Server model: larger, slower, slightly more accurate

OnlyToCompleteDailyMission.name: Only complete daily missions, exit after entry

priority.name: Purchase Priority
priority.help:
If empty, only free items will be bought. Format example: 'GRATIS > CORE_DUST_CASE > ORNAMENT'. Options:
GRATIS: Free items
CORE_DUST_CASE: Core Dust Case
ORNAMENT: Profile Ornament

priority.name: Purchase Priority
priority.help: If empty, nothing will be purchased. Format example: 'ELECTRIC_CODE > MANUAL_SELECTION_BOX'. Options include ELECTRIC_CODE, FIRE_CODE, IRON_CODE, WATER_CODE, WIND_CODE, MANUAL_SELECTION_BOX, ORNAMENT, WEAPON

priority.name: Core Purchase Priority
priority.help: Default buys gems and core dust cases. Format example: 'GEM > CORE_DUST_CASE'. Options: GEM, CORE_DUST_CASE, CREDIT_CASE, CREDIT, BATTLE_DATA_SET_CASE, GROWTH_SET, ORNAMENT, GENERAL_TICKET, ELYSION_TICKET, MISSILIS_TICKET, TETRA_TICKET, PILGRIM_TICKET, ABNORMAL_TICKET

bonePriority.name: Bone Purchase Priority
bonePriority.help: Bone currency purchase priority. Example: 'CURATED_MANUFACTURER_ARMS > MAINTENANCE_KIT_BOX_2'. Options: GOOD_TEAMWORK_BOX, MAINTENANCE_KIT_BOX_2, CURATED_MANUFACTURER_ARMS

WhenDailyTaskCompleted.name: Send notification when daily tasks complete

WhenDailyTaskCrashed.name: Send notification when daily tasks crash

WinOnePush.name: Win extra push
WinOnePush.help: When enabled on Windows, send an extra OnePush notification

OnePushConfig.name: Push Settings
OnePushConfig.help: Use Onepush to send an error message. Configuration: https://github.com/LmeSzinc/AzurLaneAutoScript/wiki/Onepush-configuration-%5BCN%5D

SendGift.name: Send Gift
SendGift.help: Give the first NIKKE with incomplete affinity a lowest-rarity affection coupon

EnhanceEquipment.name: Enhance Equipment
EnhanceEquipment.help: Enhance a random equipment in inventory, consuming one Module Booster (blue) or Module Advanced Enhancer (purple)

CallReward.name: Repeat Collect
CallReward.help: Run collect once more before claiming daily mission rewards

Enable.name: Enable
Enable.help: When enabled, collectibles will be auto-switched according to settings below

Priority.name: Priority
Priority.help:
NIKKE priority. If selected collectibles exceed 160, the current will be removed and next chosen. Format example: Helm > Exia.
NIKKE name mappings:
Diesel: Diesel
Exia: Exia
Laplace: Laplace
Frima: Frima
Viper: Viper
Helm: Helm
Miranda: Miranda
Drake: Drake
Milk: Milk
Poli: Poli
Julia: Julia
Bay: Bay
Tove: Tove

Enable.name: Enable this feature
Enable.help: When enabled, choose opponents by weight and strategy; when disabled, choose the bottom opponent

SortingWeight.name: Sorting Weight
SortingWeight.help: JSON string format. Weights must sum to 1. Set others to 0 to disable. Keys: Power, CommanderLevel, SynchroLevel, Ranking

_info.name: Conversation
_info.help: Automatically choose the correct dialog options with near-100% accuracy

OnlyLogsNotMax.name: Only converse when logs are not full
OnlyLogsNotMax.help: Only converse with NIKKE whose conversation logs are under 20. Recommend enabling 'Only converse with favorites' as well

Cookie.name: Cookie
Cookie.help: Please refer to the documentation for the acquisition method: https://github.com/megumiss/NIKKEAutoScript/wiki/Configuration-Guide

_info.name: Daily Tasks
_info.help: Community daily sign-in, comment, and like tasks https://www.blablalink.com

Immediately.name: Execute Immediately
Immediately.help: By default, tasks scheduled between 4:00–8:00 are postponed to after 8:00. Enable to execute immediately

_info.name: CDK Auto Redemption
_info.help: By default, redeem CDKs recommended on BlaBlaLink

Extra.name: Extra CDK Sources
Extra.help: Fetch the latest 5 CDKs from third-party sites and redeem automatically

Priority.name: Exchange Priority
Priority.help: If empty, nothing will be purchased. Format example: 'Gem_×320 > Welcome_Gift_Core_Dust_×30'. Default is to exchange for Gems. Example options include Gem_×320, Welcome_Gift_Core_Dust_×30, Gem_×30, Skill_Manual_I_×5, Ultra_Boost_Module_×5, Code_Manual_Selection_Box_×5, Gem_×60, Mid-Quality_Mold_×3, Credit_Case_(1H)_x9, Core_Dust_Case_(1H)_×3, Gem_×120, Mid-Quality_Mold_×8, Battle_Data_Set_Case_(1H)_×6, Core_Dust_Case_(1H)_×6, Skill_Manual_I_×30, Ultra_Boost_Module_×30, Code_Manual_Selection_Box_×30

Challenge.name: Challenge
Challenge.help: Requires teams to be set up in advance

Story.name: Stage Sweep
Story.help: Fast fight on the penultimate stage. Must have cleared penultimate stage of current open stage. Use SemiCombat for auto routing. Ensure your stage progress follows the event

Coop.name: Coop
Coop.help: Built-in Coop in large events defaults to easy play for Normal difficulty

Shop.name: Shop
Shop.help: Attempt to buy all event currency items except titles in order (may not always work)

ShopDelayList.name: Shop Delay Purchase List
ShopDelayList.help: Items in this list will be purchased only after obtaining red orbs. One per line. Currently only supports delaying TITLE purchases

Game.name: Mini Game
Game.help: Adapt mini-games when possible; otherwise skip

Enable.name: Enable Strategy
Enable.help: Choose which side to cheer based on strategy and current support ratios

DropScreenshotPath.name: Drop Screenshot Path
DropScreenshotPath.help: Creates dated folders under the path to save drop screenshots. Empty to disable. Example: D:\\PCR\\NIKKE. Docker users should use a path starting with /app/NIKKEAutoScript

_info.name: Team Settings
_info.help: Automatically select team based on chosen BOSS

SkipRatioCheck.name: Ignore Top Record
SkipRatioCheck.help: Recommended to keep off. When on, overclock top record won't be checked and it will run daily

AlwaysReselect.name: Always Reselect Options
AlwaysReselect.help: Always reselect based on list below. If off, selection occurs only at season start

ModifierList.name: Overclock Options
ModifierList.help:
Supports common overclock options only:
ENEMY_WEAPON_UP_1/2/3: Enemy Weapon Up I/II/III
ENEMY_ARMOR_UP_1/2/3: Enemy Armor Up I/II/III
ENEMY_VITALS_UP_1/2/3: Enemy Vitals Up I/II/III
NO_RECYCLING: Disable Recycling
AGGRESSIVE_TACTICS: Aggressive Tactics
RUSH_HOUR_1/2/3: Rush Hour I/II/III
RELEVANT_PERSONNEL_ONLY: Relevant Personnel Only
Default selection is Enemy Weapon Up III, Enemy Armor Up III, Enemy Vitals Up III, Disable Recycling, Aggressive Tactics, Rush Hour III, Relevant Personnel Only (total 25x). Fill one per line. Reduce options if your collection strength is insufficient.
If the top record shown on the overclock page is equal to or higher than the total multiplier entered below, overclock will be skipped

_info.name: Auto Tower
_info.help: Automatically climb normal tribe tower; stop on failure

_info.name: Semi-Auto Click
_info.help: Semi-automatic clicks to skip some interactions. Can auto-click battle, quick fight, skip story, next stage, area transfer. Requires manual stage selection and team setup in advance

FightQuickly.name: Quick Battle
FightQuickly.help: Disable when using tickets in stages

MainStoryMark.name: Auto Follow Main Story
MainStoryMark.help: When enabled, auto-click main story normal difficulty exclamation marks and hide minimap. May auto-progress main story but is unstable and will miss enemies 100%

CDK.name: CDK
CDK.help: Paste the CDKs into the input box, one per line. After the prompt says the settings have been saved successfully, click Start to redeem.

_info.name: Highlights
_info.help: Auto-view highlights. Start on NIKKE's gift/conversation page

AutoSwitch.name: Auto Switch
AutoSwitch.help: When a NIKKE's highlights are complete, auto-switch to next. Stop with F10

Orientation.name: Orientation
Orientation.help: Manually change screen orientation; recommend Ctrl+F12

Hosts.name: Hosts
Hosts.help: Append uncommented entries below to system Hosts file (Windows only). International servers enabled by default. Uncomment desired servers. It's recommended to only enable hosts for your server and adjust as needed.

_info.name: Task Status
_info.help: Stores internal task states. Can be cleared manually if tasks behave abnormally

Toast.DisableTranslateMode: Click here to disable translation mode
Toast.ClickToUpdate: Update available — click here to update

AddNKAS.FileExist: A config with the same name exists. Please enter a different name
AddNKAS.InvalidChar: Config name cannot contain any of the following characters: .\\/:*?"<>|

AppManage.NameExist: A config with the same name exists. Please enter a different name
AppManage.InvalidChar: Config name cannot contain any of the following characters: .\\/:*?"<>|
AppManage.OverrideWarning: This will overwrite the existing config file
AppManage.Name: Config Name

Update.UpdateWait: Wait for all NKAS to finish current tasks
Update.UpdateFailed: Update failed. See ./log/*_gui.txt for error logs
Update.Author: Author
Update.DisabledWarn: Update module is disabled; you need to manually restart NKAS to update

Remote.NotRunning: Not running — disconnected from server or server offline
Remote.NotEnable: Not enabled. Set webui password in deploy.yaml and enable remote control
Remote.SSHNotInstall: SSH not installed on system. Refer to guide to install or download SSH
